name: Grilled Marinated Flank Steak
keywords: beef, brown sugar, chili-sesame oil, dark beer, flank steak, garlic, ginger, tamari, main course
recipeIngredient: Flank steak (allow 8 ounces uncooked per person)
2 tablespoons fresh grated ginger (or 1 teaspoon ground)
4 clove garlic, or more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Score the meat with small incisions. Whisk together all other ingredients. Pour over the meat. Refrigerate overnight.
Carefully grill the meat over high heat. Check constantly for doneness. The meat will continue to cook after you take it off grill, so it should be pinker than you like it.
Slice the meat, and serve or refrigerate.
